COMPOSITION:

 
Each Ciprofloxacin 500mg Tablet contains 582.20 mg ciprofloxacin hydrochloride equivalent to 500mg Ciprofloxacin 
 

DOSAGE: 

 
Usual Adult Dose for Pneumonia
 
IV: 400 mg IV every 8 to 12 hours 
Oral: 500 to 750 mg orally every 12 hours 
Duration of Therapy: 7 to 14 days

COMPOSITION:

 
Active ingredient (in each tablet) 
Aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid). Pain reliever/fever reducer 
Inactive ingredients 
carnauba wax*, corn starch, hypromellose, powdered cellulose, triacetin


DOSAGE:

 
Usual Adult Dose for Fever 

Oral: 
300 to 650 mg orally every 4 to 6 hours as needed 
Maximum dose: 4 g in 24 hours 

Rectal: 
300 to 600 mg rectally every 4 hours

COMPOSITION:

 
Each tablet contains 40.38 mg lactose (as lactose monohydrate). 

DOSAGE:
 
Usual Adult Dose for Acute Mountain Sickness 
Usual dose: 2 mg orally every 6 hours OR 4 mg orally every 12 hours

COMPOSITION:

 
Chlordiazepoxide (5 mg) + Clidinium (2.5 mg). 

Dosage:
 
The usual maintenance dose is 1 or 2 capsules, 3 or 4 times a day administered before meals and at bedtime.

COMPOSITION:

 Paracetamol 

DOSAGE:
 
Adults and children over 12 year 
For mild to moderate symptoms : 1 tablet 
3 to 4 times a day
